name: Zombie Bite
description: Bitten by infected. No cure. Countdown to turning.
narration: fever burning, skin turning gray, eyes glazing over

name: Infected Bite
description: Deep bite wound, infected but not zombified. Deadly without treatment.
narration: fever burning, infection spreading from the wound

name: Broken Leg
description: Fractured tibia. Needs rest to heal. Can't run.
narration: limping badly, every step agony, leg useless

name: Gunshot Wound
description: Bullet wound, bleeding. Needs medicine fast.
narration: bleeding through bandages, pain radiating with every heartbeat

name: Concussion
description: Head trauma. Confusion, dizziness. Heals with rest.
narration: head pounding, vision blurry, can't think straight

name: Sprained Ankle
description: Twisted ankle. Painful but not life-threatening.
narration: favoring one leg, wincing with each step

name: Deep Laceration
description: Deep cut. Risk of infection without treatment.
narration: wound angry and red, oozing blood

name: Severe Exhaustion
description: Pushed too hard. Need rest desperately.
narration: barely staying upright, every movement feels like pushing through mud
